dialog.title: Configuración de apariencia
dialog.description: Choose your preferred interface appearance. You have the option to pick a theme manually or enable automatic theme switching that aligns with your system settings.

system.title: Tema del sistema
system.label: Default
system.description: This theme will use the theme your system is using.

light.title: Tema claro
light.label: Ligh mode
light.description: Active when your system is configured to use light mode.

signin.title: Fast and secure login.
signin.description: Sign in with your favorite platform — simple, secure, and password-free. We support Discord, Google, and more so you can log in with just a click. Your data stays safe, and you get instant access — no forms, no hassle.

mobile.title: Get started
mobile.description: Your data stays safe, and you get instant access — no forms, no hassle.

notFound.title: Oops... We couldn't find this page
notFound.description: Looks like this page got lost along the way. Check the URL or head back home.
